name: Snort
short_description: Fast, lightweight Nostr client with real-time updates and clean interface.
description: Snort is a blazing fast, lightweight Nostr client built with React. It provides a clean, modern interface for using the Nostr decentralized social network. Features include real-time updates via WebSocket, following management, notes and threads, likes and reposts, zaps (Lightning payments), NIP-05 verification, multiple accounts, and DM support. It's designed for speed and simplicity - no bloat, just a fast way to use Nostr. Perfect for those who want a quick, responsive client without heavy features.
usecases: Access Nostr social network through a fast, modern web interface.
Post notes, reply to threads, and interact with the community.
Follow accounts and see real-time updates from your feed.
Send and receive direct messages on the Nostr network.
notes: Can connect to multiple relays simultaneously
